start.text: I just pushed an AI into the water... I saved your ass!!!!

askAI.text: Closed AI... Yes. I used to work there. I helped work on the NewBrain project, it ruined me, it really did.
askAI.name: Employee

askName.text: What good are names anymore? The world is ending, shouldn't you worry about better things? Going on that trip from your bucket list... Or working day in and day out, just like you always do. Even though you know it's your fault all of this happened. Sorry! I got a little carried away, what was it you said again?

work.text: I've spent more years in the Closed AI labs than i wish to admit. It wasn't easy to let go. They wanted you to stay forever.
work.name: Employee

hate.text: They didn't care what was happening around them. They didn't even stop to look around at all. All that mattered was the money and the engagement.

explain.text: The last project. The one everyone talked about. I'm sure you remember, it was everywhere. NewBrain... The brain chip that would make you smart, likeable, funny and perfect. Everyone went crazy for it and the world became so bland.

explain2.text: And the production, look what it did. Nothing's the same anymore, do you remember what fresh air felt like?

explain3.text: As a human you should be able to smell the shit stained air they created.
